name: Da Capo 3 R
description: Da Capo, a tale of love, romance, and friendship blooming as winter turns to spring. Enter Weather Vane, a magic school beneath the city of London, where Kiyotaka and others weave the tales of their lives.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core 2 Duo Or Better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128Mb DirectX 9 Compatible Adapter Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Any
